byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: French experts expect final phase of German attack this wk
snippet: VICHY, France, Sept. 2--Military experts here, discussing the German aerial operations against Britain, believe this week may see their climax....

headline.main: FRENCH SEE CLIMAX IN DRIVE ON BRITAIN; Experts Look for Final Phase of Nazi Attack This Week

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Sept. 2--Military experts here, discussing the German aerial operations against Britain, believe this week may see their climax.
